rules_text:
Dormant {1}{B}{B} [i](You may cast this spell for its dormant cost. If you do, it isn't a creature.)[/i]
When Student-Made Abomination enters, target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
flavor_text:
[i]“Whoever made this better confess now or the next exam will be harder than the finals.”
—Mia, Strict Mentor[/i]
